pullrequest.title: Add light as child of link

content.raw: ya light are currently stored in World so they are treated the same as lights without parents. This eventually won't be a problem when lights are loaded in Link class. I have changes to prevent them from being modified but those changes would need to be removed when merging forward so I'm tempted to leave this as is. What do you think?
content.html: ya light are currently stored in World so they are treated the same as lights without parents. This eventually won't be a problem when lights are loaded in Link class. I have changes to prevent them from being modified but those changes would need to be removed when merging forward so I'm tempted to leave this as is. What do you think?
